data.message: That picture looks fake though. Hard to tell if it is really him or photo shopped. Anyways does this mean shady is quitting rap and going to be a camp director? Is he gonna teach you how to rap? The structure of song writing and stuff? And if it is a camp sign me up now. Lol

replies.message: lol its photoshopped. you kill me burgundy
I know its photo shopped. I was joking about the camp stuff, lol
Now I know it is photo shopped anyways. I realized why you replied rereading my own comment, lol
It's not photo shopped it's on the shady record  twitter
Michelle Mackeand it looks photo shopped and doesn't even look like Eminem fully. His head looks likes it doesn't fit properly on his body. Lol
He's got some tiny trump hands if it's not photoshopped.
Mike Peterson that's what I mean. The only thing that looks like him is the head, lol. And even that's wrong cause he has a beard now and don't think his hair is still bleached.
Listen man its really hard to read sarcasm so i almost thought you were serious 😂
Anthony Armstrong I said lol at the end to show that I was joking.

No. I'm not serious. I doubt Em would be a camp director when he retires. He would be harassed by the public too much. He already has to deal with that now. I mean even if it was in Michigan specifically people would still go just so they could meet him who don't even live in Michigan. Like people who it'd be a few hours to drive they'd still go to meet him and probably bother him

Isaac Kurasaki 

Not even close to a reality
Louis Padilla what you mean? What are you talking about exactly?
Matthew McConnell I can't even zoom in on that to see it very clearly so it is hard to tell and from a distance it doesn't look like Eminem.

You have the same initials as Em though ironically. Eminem killed by M&M. Mathew Mitchell, I even have your initials, lol. Only your last name is McConnell and it doesn't rhyme with initials, lol. If he said something like I ran into Mathew McConnell at McDonald's it would rhyme a little bit, but yeah. Lol.
You're right. That's hella photoshopped. Everyone waits to see what it means tho.....
Lol no shit he put his face on another picture, its supposed to be funny. You people are fucking retarded.
Mark Minadeo lol. That's all you got out of this? Ok then
Beverley Walker this whole comment was a joke accept for pointing out that it was photo shopped. So you are telling me it is sarcasm when I was joking, lol
